body_content.explanation: the use of anaphors (= words that refer to and replace other words used earlier in a text):
examples: In anaphora, the meaning of an expression depends on its antecedent.

body_content.explanation: the practice in literature or rhetoric (= speech or writing intended to impress or persuade people) of repeating the same word at the start of several sentences to achieve an effect:
examples: No poet has used anaphora more effectively than he does in this work, with every line beginning "Because".
